mapper.select: select prod_id, prod_name, prod_price, prod_category, img_srcs, img_tag from ( select rownum rn, p.prod_id as prod_id, p.prod_name as prod_name, p.prod_price as prod_price, p.prod_category as prod_category, i.img_srcs as img_srcs, i.img_tag as img_tag from products p join imgs i on p.prod_id = i.prod_id where rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} and img_tag='thumNail' and lower(prod_category) like lower('%'||#{prod_category}||'%') ) where rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}

select count(*) from ( select rownum rn, p.prod_id as prod_id, p.prod_name as prod_name, p.prod_price as prod_price, p.prod_category as prod_category, i.img_srcs as img_srcs, i.img_tag as img_tag from products p join imgs i on p.prod_id = i.prod_id where img_tag = 'thumNail' and lower(prod_category) like lower('%'||#{prod_category}||'%') )
